meanings.sent1: The modern city had a nonfeudal government structure.
meanings.sent2: Her nonfeudal beliefs clashed with the traditional views of the village.
meanings.sent3: The nonfeudal chickens rebelled against the old rooster's rules.
meanings.sent4: In the nonfeudal world of technology, innovation reigns supreme.
meanings.sent5: The nonfeudal landscape was a stark contrast to the medieval town nearby.

meanings.sent1: The new fashion trend was nonfeudal and embraced by the youth.
meanings.sent2: His nonfeudal manners stood out in the formal gathering.
meanings.sent3: The nonfeudal cat refused to bow to the king of the house.
meanings.sent4: Her nonfeudal approach to leadership brought a fresh perspective.
meanings.sent5: The nonfeudal architecture of the building reflected a modern design.

meanings.sent1: The rebels fought for a nonfeudal society free from oppression.
meanings.sent2: Their nonfeudal ideology challenged the existing power structures.
meanings.sent3: The nonfeudal knights rode into battle against the feudal lords.
meanings.sent4: In the nonfeudal realm of ideas, freedom reigned supreme.
meanings.sent5: The nonfeudal revolution brought about a new era of equality.
